Improvements.Improvement: Return an empty list instead of null
Improvements.Description: Returning null from methods that return collections or arrays can be error prone, as it can lead to null pointer exceptions. Instead, return an empty list or array.

Improvements.Improvement: Replace manual array iteration with enhanced for loop
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- for (  JavaParameter parameter : parameterList) {
+ for (JavaParameter parameter : parameterList) {
Improvements.Description: The enhanced for loop (for-each loop) is simpler and more readable; it avoids the possibility of bugs and makes the code easier to read.
The continue statement is unnecessary here because there are no more statements in the loop after it, so it doesn't actually do anything and can be removed.
